settings.heading: Where are we and what is the cost of shipping?
settings.row_content:
Our headquarter is in New York, USA.  We have our product design, manufacture and fulfillment team in multiple worldwide offices and warehouses to offer you the best shipping options.  

Depending on your exact location and preferred shipping option, the cost will be provided in the checkout page.

settings.heading: How many days will it take to receive my order and what countries are included for shipping?
settings.row_content: All orders will be processed and shipped within 24 hours after purchase. Our shipping service is available worldwide, it takes approx. 5-14 days to receive your order depending on your country of location.

settings.heading: Will these accesories void my vehicle's warranty?
settings.row_content: No, it will not. Our light accessories only utilizes external powersources: USB/12 Volt socket. It is a safe and non-invasive installation that does not require any wire breaking or tapping. You can confidently install our kit without worrying about voiding your Tesla's warranty.

settings.heading: Installation
settings.row_content: Our light kit offers bothEASY&ADVANCEDinstallation solutions. You can confidently choose the installation method that suits you best. Installation tutorials are now available on YouTube, and the full manual will be provided after purchase.

settings.heading: <big> The difference between Easy/Advanced Installation? <big></big></big>
settings.row_content:
The only difference between the Easy and Advanced installation methods lies in how the wires are positioned.

Easy: the wires are placed on the center console, making them visible but allowing for a quicker installation. This option is ideal for DIY beginners.
Advanced: hiding the wires inside the large panels under the center console, resulting in a clean and organized appearance with no visible wires. We highly recommend this installation method if you desire a wire-free look for your Tesla.

settings.heading: How long does it take to install?
Is there only 1 color option?
settings.row_content: Our lighting accessories include numerous color options and modes.

settings.heading: App Download
settings.row_content: Download the app on apple store /google play by scanning theQR codeon our light kit's main connector.

settings.heading: How to turn On/Off the lights?
settings.row_content:
There are four ways to do it:

  1. Simply press the power source button.
  2. Use the app to turn the lights "On/Off".
  3. Schedule a specific "On/Off time" through the app.
  4. The lights will automatically turn off when the vehicle goes into sleep mode (off time varies by model) and turn back on when the car awakens.

settings.heading: Is there a warranty for the lights kit?
settings.row_content: Our Tesla light kit comes with aone-yearwarranty as we take pride in offering top-notch quality and customer service.
